main.name: Emre Cosar
main.bio: Interests in playing and creating better software solutions. Hands on experience about Spring Boot, React and AWS with the TDD approach using CI/CD. Started to career as full-stack web engineer and mobile(Android and iOS ) engineer then now go on as backend engineer. Strong and eager about Java and JavaScript. Clean coder, open-source committer and enjoys fork&try projects! Loves to build software solutions that makes a difference and/or add value. To achieve that, especially pays attention to code quality and to the process (whether the right tools and frameworks are used in the project for optimal result). Has strong communication skills and he is goal oriented.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: As a backend developer, creating software solutions rely on micro-service architecture using Spring Boot and React with CI/CD pipelines running on AWS environment. Working with self-managable teams and devops culture. Excellent communication withing teams in and outside of the company.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: Worked on mobile banking application both native Android and iOS clients, has eye-verify login option first in banking apps, and APIs. Then created micro services architectures with Spring Boot and Spring Cloud for core banking domains. Using TDD approach and cloud contract tests. Sticks with clean code principles.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: As a full stack developer inside Web Technologies & Social Media Applications Department, maintained bank's public site and made a mobile version of it. Created Twitter and Facebook web applications that bank's customers use and enrolled campaigns over Facebook and twitter. Also was a part of team that created iGaranti(now as GarantiOne) web, facebook and mobile applications. Developed notification based Google Glass application, first in Turkey, for iGaranti mobile application. Created new products and platforms for our customers to touch in so many ways. In every aspects of application development processes; designing the architecture, creating web and backend level.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: As an intern in Gdansk/Poland for 3 months, worked at CRM based company, Netz. First business experience was about java based desktop applications and three different Android applications about viewing CRM document and tracking customer-cargo locations.

education.description: Bachelor's thesis is ontology based issue tracking systems integration. Common and general ontology is designed and modelled for understanding different issue tracking systems and running in between. Also common tools and algorithms will be used for inferencing and generating graphical visualisation.
